MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH1 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.17pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Grassmarket substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:57pm on Sunday, 27 December 2020
